page.title: 08MY DAY IN MOFFAT
page.content: {MICHAEL STEWART AGED 11 {8.00}Out of bed,wash hands and face (maybe even hair!),brush teeth. {8.15}Weetabix toast and tea for breakfast. {8.30}Bike 300 metres to school(Moffat Academy Primary)and meet some friends. {9.00}Into school for Maths or Reading. {11.00}Interval until{11.20}then Science or Domesday Project. {12.30}Lunch at home then back to play at tag or something with my friends. {13.45}Back in for yet more work! {15.35}Home on my racer to change and play my favourite football! {17.00}Home for tea which can be almost anything.Do homework then watch Television or read for a while. {21.30}The end of a busy day.Into bed to sleep and look forward to the weekend and the long summer holidays.
